page.title: 09Lifestyles in Cheshunt
page.content: In 1985 some of the most popular music groups were Wham and Duran Duran, and singers like Madonna and Paul Young. Long playing records cost 4 pounds 99 pence.The best selling records are put in a chart called the 'Top 4o'. Most pop groups now make a video film with their records. Television is a popular form of entertainment. People enjoy watching 'soap operasÂ£ or serials like Dallas and Eastenders.Dallas is based on an oil family, while Eastenders is about people living in London.Action films are popular in the cinema, but more people are now watching video tapes of the films at home. The summer fashion for the girls is shorts and flower patterned blouses, and it is also popular to have your hair permed. The boys are wearing ear rings and expensive sportswear.
